You will need to have an AWS profile set up and activated on your local machine in order to use the AWS provider in Terraform.

You can set up an AWS profile by creating a `~/.aws/credentials` file with the following format:
```makefile
[profile_name]
aws_access_key_id = YOUR_ACCESS_KEY
aws_secret_access_key = YOUR_SECRET_KEY
```
Replace `profile_name` with the name you want to use for your profile and `YOUR_ACCESS_KEY` and `YOUR_SECRET_KEY` with your actual AWS access key and secret key, respectively.

Once you have created the `credentials` file, you can activate your profile by setting the `AWS_PROFILE` environment variable:
```javascript
export AWS_PROFILE=profile_name
```
You should then be able to run Terraform without encountering the error you mentioned.
